vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
Τῡφων-ικός, ή, όν,
Typhonian, of or from Typhon, [Refs 1st c.AD+]
__II (τυφῶν 11.1) tempestuous, ἄνεμος [NT]
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
of hurricane force tempetuous
stormy, tempestuous, of hurricane force;, with ἄνεμος it means hurricane, typhoon, whirlwind, Acts 27:14*
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition: 旋風般的, 暴風雨的 (徒 27:14)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition: 旋风般的, 暴风雨的 (徒 27:14)
